name: The Duck Is In Danger
description:
The Duck Is In Danger is a side-scrolling game with the hardest levels and the most dangerous traps !!! In this incredibly kurta and fun game you play as Karl the duck. You have to get through all the obstacles, all the most dangerous traps that you will meet on the way to complete this game.

Would you like to feel like a cheerful duckling who easily overcomes all obstacles on its way? If your answer is yes, then this game will become a real diamond for you !!! Plunge into the world of fun and madness together with Karl the duckling! Get real pleasure, passing incredibly difficult and truly dangerous tests that you will meet on your way. It will be incredibly easy to die from crazy traps in this game, but it will be very, very difficult to win and reach the end !!! Enjoy the passage of this game with funny music that will immerse you in the game world with your head and will not let you break away from the game until the very end !!!

Features of the game:
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Incredibly cool, challenging and interesting levels!
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Incredibly beautiful graphics!
Funny music!
